about_the_game:
This game is in early Alpha. Discord available!

  • Gameplay: Fallen Kings is first and foremost a RPG. This means that choices matter!! Get involved in the hundreds of quests and storylines in this game. Find secret endings to quests, rise the ranks of a local mercenary group, or watch as your choices (or lack of) change the world you live in. Fallen Kings is also full of action. Choose from over 100 abilities and skills in a classless play-how-you-want system. From magic to dual-wielding assault shields, decimate foes in the world or dungeons the way you want!

    Want to be a time-slowing-blade-master?

  • The World: Find books or talk with historians to learn more about the rich lore of Kreel. Secrets and dangers can be found throughout the land but be careful, Fallen Kings does not hand hold. Want to find out more about the Fallen King? Got to ask someone that would know about it. Want to get an alternate ending (or more?) to that epic quest? Got to figure it out! The world of Kreel can be influenced by you and your choices. Consequences will happen because and in spite of your decisions.

  • Key Features:

    • 'WASD' movement or traditional click-to-move

    • Hundreds of quests with most having secret or alternate endings

    • 100+ abilities and skills to combine in any way you want!

    • Factions - Gain or lose reputation based on your actions

    • Huge world map to explore with deep lore to get lost in

    • Tons of dungeons and caves to explore and loot

    • Hundreds of items to loot and use

    • Optional crafting - Smithing, cooking, alchemy, and more!

    • Relationships - Find love or friendships

    • Housing - Buy homes during your adventures

content_descriptors.notes: Fallen Kings contains many scenes of violent behavior and mature topics including but not limited to; suicide, drug use, mental illness, and cannibalism.

short_description: Fallen Kings is a top-down, open-world RPG with many ARPG elements. Delve into the hundreds of quests/stories or just kill things in a dungeon. Play how you want!
